eventSummary:
US Banks have expressed deep concern about cybersecurity risks following a cyberattack on a top financial regulator. Bank groups have warned about regulators' cybersecurity weaknesses, highlighting vulnerabilities in the financial regulatory infrastructure.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/22509979/US-Banks-Deeply-Concerned-About-Cybersecurity-Risk-Following-Attack-on-Top-Financial-Regulator
- https://www.americanbanker.com/news/bank-groups-warn-of-regulators-cybersecurity-weaknesses
- https://bsky.app/profile/alexisrjimenez.bsky.social/post/3lrblgiakma24
